examples.comment_3: Use SearchCriteria to find a particular image

content.title: **[{{ProdFullName}}]({{ProductUrl}})** offers {{EnvName}} developers a powerful API for editing watermarks across diverse {{FileFormatUp}} documents. Here's a comprehensive guide to streamline your workflow:
content.step_1: **Start the Process:** Begin by providing your {{FileFormatUp}} file as an argument to the **Watermarker** class constructor. Depending on your requirements, the file can be sourced either as a stream or from a local disk location.
content.step_2: **Pinpoint Watermarks:** Use the **SearchCriteria** object to identify the watermarks in need of modification. This versatile tool enables targeted watermark selection based on specific properties.
content.step_3: **Refine with Precision:** Upon successful execution of the search, gain access to a collection of relevant watermarks. Enjoy granular control over each element, with the ability to update dimensions, page positioning, text content, color, image data, and more.
content.step_4: **Seamless Persistence:** Once watermark updates are complete, securely store the modified document. The API offers flexible storage options, allowing you to save to a local file path or as a stream object.

more_features.title: Deep dive into adding Watermark
more_features.description: API to render, display, convert documents, slides, diagrams, and many other document types in .NET applications

feature_1.title: Watermark your documents easily.
feature_1.content: {{ProdShortName}} makes it easy for {{EnvName}} developers to add various types of watermarks in popular business documents and files.

feature_2.title: Customize watermarks for your goals.
feature_2.content: Our solution supports many watermark features. You can easily adjust size, rotation, color, font, font styles and other options to make watermark looks perfect.

feature_3.title: Use native document objects
feature_3.content: Accordingly do particular document format it is possible to use native document features. Native PDF annotations or MS Word page watermark may be used for watermarking.

code_1.title: Update Presentation watermark content
code_1.content: This example shows how to update text content of Presentation watermarks
code_1.comment_2: Get list of appropriate watermarks using search
code_1.comment_4: Save updated presentation to local disk or stream
